editorialNotes.standard: You need toothpaste, golf clubs, and batteries—and you need them now. Known for its colossal shopping catalog, Amazon packs virtually all of the features and functions found on its website into this ample app, whether you’re buying gifts, tracking orders, or scanning items in a brick-and-mortar store for an online price comparison. It’s easy to navigate, intuitive, and extremely fast.
editorialNotes.short: Size up your next couch with AR product stickers
Big 11.11 deals on China's largest direct-buying portal.
This perfect shopping app for that look that you won't find in any mall.
Decorate your home with stylish furniture and decor.
editorialNotes.tagline: See items in 3D before you buy

editorialNotes.short: Get ready for the new school year with notebooks, pencils and so much more.

editorialNotes.tagline: Find great deals with Watch List
editorialNotes.standard: Gathering the dozens of weekly promotional flyers and coupon books from every store in your area would take forever, not to mention that it’d cost the lives of many innocent trees. Flipp automatically collects advertised offers from local stores and online retailers, letting you flip through perfect digital copies of flyers to circle items you’re interested in or clip virtual coupons for hundreds of products. It’s an intelligent and indispensable shopping companion that saves time, money, and plenty of paper.
editorialNotes.short: Save time and money with deals and coupons at your fingertips.

editorialNotes.tagline: Shop local with a new Widget

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: There are some extraordinarily clever and crafty people in the world, and we’re glad so many of them use Etsy to share their amazing wares. We love searching it to find unique and thoughtful gifts, from one-of-a-kind handcrafted jackets to customised videogame consoles. Etsy’s clean, professional and easy to use—whether you’re an avid shopper or an entrepreneur using it to run your business.
editorialNotes.short: Find vintage, quirky and creative gift ideas for everyone.

editorialNotes.tagline: Never leave money on the table
editorialNotes.standard: Ebates is a fantastically easy way to earn cash-back discounts at hundreds of online stores that you’re probably shopping at already. Just pick your favourite stores, and the rebates are activated whether or not you take advantage of the hot deals on tap. We love watching the savings add up and receiving a nice big cheque every few months. It almost feels like getting paid to shop.
